pullrequest.title: Refactor physics::SurfaceParams class to ODESurfaceParams, BulletSurfaceParams, etc

content.raw:
Your comments are good, and I have started writing code to address them, but adding that code to this pull request would move it away from the spirit of refactoring that this pull request started with. So if you don't mind I'll fix these in my next friction pull request.

EDIT: added a note in #989 reminding me to do this.
